paragraph.materialsCitation: Neotype ♂ in NHML (see Clay & Hopkins 1954: 249 , pl. 11: fig. 5).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Chilean hosts:
Larus dominicanus Lichtenstein, 1823
;
Larus pipixcan Wagler, 1831
.

Chilean localities: Santo Domingo ( Valparaíso ): Region V ; Talcahuano: Region VIII; Río Lluta : Region XV
.

Chilean references:
González-Acuña et al . (2006a)
; González-Acuña et al . (2011); Beltrán-Saavedra (2015) ;
González-Acuña et al . (2020b)
.

Remarks:
Saemundssonia ( Saemundssonia ) lari
is a morphologically variable “head & neck” louse frequently collected from many species of gulls. Palma (2017: 202) discussed the sensu lato status of
Saemundssonia ( Saemundssonia ) lari
.
